recommended_degree: Elektronika, Elektronika Industri, Teknik Elektro, Elektro Mekanika, Teknik Elektro Industri (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1. Installation: Set up electrical systems, including wiring, lighting, circuit breakers, switches, outlets, and other components according to blueprints and schematics.
2. Maintenance: Perform regular inspections and upkeep on electrical equipment to ensure they are operating safely and efficiently.
3. Repair: Diagnose and fix issues in electrical systems, replacing faulty parts like wiring, circuit boards, and fixtures.
4. Troubleshooting: Use diagnostic tools and technical knowledge to identify and resolve electrical problems.
5. Safety and compliance: Ensure all work adheres to safety standards, electrical codes, and regulation
6. Collaboration: Work with other engineers, technicians, and cross-functional teams to complete projects.
